altername_name: Are You Smarter Than A 10 Year Old?
Are You Smarter than a 10 Year Old: The Official Nintendo DS Game
name: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?
overview: Class is in session—how much have you forgotten since grammar school? Step up to the podium and put your smarts on the line to see if you’re smarter than a 5th grader! Go ahead and play…we won’t tell!
